name: Where's The Drip?
description:
"Well Earth, it's been a good one but I gotta head back to my home. I'll just start up my drip drive and... um... Ategev? Where's the drip?"

In Where's The Drip? you play as the stranded Ukog Pird as he pilots his spacecraft around the city of Driptopia. Explore the city and use your spacecraft's tractor beam to find the materials you need to power up your drip levels and return home. Interact with objects, search the city and let your intuition take charge as you use every tool in your arsenal (all one of them) to bring Ukog and Ategev home! 

Controls: 

WASD- Move

Shift- Activate tractor beam 

Mouse- Control Camera

Escape- Pause

Credits:

John Pham: Lead Designer, Programmer

Jerry Chen: Programmer

Minh Pham: Programmer

Jon Fink: Level Designer

Noah Seto: Producer

Brendan Du: Writer

Background music: Retro Dreamscape by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org)

Entry for  Global Game Jam 2021 #ggj21

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/wheres-drip-0
